name: Women and Environments
description: An examination of the impact the environment has on women's lives around the world. Current and historical perspectives. Topics will include: the impact of environmental degradation on women's bodies; planning for safer places; global sustainable development; ecofeminism; the gender division of spaces.
prerequisites: 1.5 credits in WST, 1.0 credits of which must be at the B- and/or C-level.
